EmailTemplate.description: Email sent to RG that have RTS field as TRUE
EmailTemplate.name: RG RTS Email
EmailTemplate.subject: Camp Quality - Problem with your details
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Greetings {!Contact.FirstName},
A Big Thank You for your ongoing support and commitment to making this world a happier place for children and families impacted by cancer. You’re a hero!
I am emailing you regarding your contact details. We have recently received returned mail from you and would like to ensure we have your most up-to-date address.
By updating your details, we can keep you informed of the life-changing difference you are making to the lives of children impacted by cancer and send you your annual receipt at the end of the financial year.
To update your postal address please click this link, email us on betterdaysreplies@campquality.org.au with your updated information or call me directly 1300 787 125. It's easy and it won't take long!
Thank you so much for taking the time to update your information. You’re awesome!
Warm Regards,
Inbar
